name: ValentineScreensaverHD
0:
”Alexa, open Valentine Screensaver”
”Alexa, play Valentine Screensaver”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: valentine screensaver
des:
Valentine Screensaver HD on your Echo Show or Echo Spot device (required a screen). Valentine Screensaver plays 1 hour of relaxing flying hearts on your Echo Show Echo Spot or Fire TV (random 1 of 5 heart screensaver every time you open skill).

Add Valentine Screensaver to any room. This beautiful relaxing moving wallpaper will bring you peace and love. Try for Valentine's Day or an Anniversary too!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
